system.description:
Also at 7th level, your unnatural nature manifests as more than just your physical appearance. Choose one of the following.

Dreadful Presence

The horrific nature of your mutations lends you a terrifying aura. When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you may use your reaction to briefly intensify the horror of your physical form. The target creature must make a Wisdom saving throw versus your maneuver DC or become frightened of you until the end of your next turn. Once you have used this ability, you may not do so again until you complete a long rest.

You may use your Dreadful Presence feature as a free action if you are frenzied.

Otherworldly Curiosity

Your mutations elicit morbid fascination in those around you. Once per long rest, as a bonus action you may choose one creature that you can see within 15 feet of you. That creature must make a Charisma saving throw versus your maneuver DC or become fixated by you until the end of your next turn. Once you have used this ability, you may not do so again until you complete a short or a long rest.

You may use your Otherwordly Curiosity feature as a free action if you are frenzied.
